web_snippets: Ian Tomlinson. FRS FMedSci. Professor of Cancer Genetics. Senior Clinical Researcher, University of Oxford; Fellow, Academy of Medical Sciences; Fellow, ...
Ian Tomlinson is a British scientist who is a director of the Institute of Cancer and Genomic Sciences at the University of Birmingham.
Ian Tomlinson is Chief Scientific Officer/Founder at Domantis Ltd. See Ian Tomlinson's compensation, career history, education, & memberships.
